text: Sports Réunis Colmar is a former French association football team founded in 1920. ==History== The team was based in Colmar, Alsace, and was playing in the Championnat National, the third tier in the French football after winning Group A of the Championnat de France amateur in the 2009–10 season. The team plays its home matches at Colmar Stadium in Colmar. Colmar has played one season in Ligue 1 in 1948–49 and have spent five seasons in the second division Ligue 2. On 23 January 2010, Colmar defeated professional club Lille OSC in the Coupe de France 10–9 on penalty kicks giving the club one of its biggest victories to date.Lille falls to Colmar in French Cup shocker The club was liquidated in November 2016, and was reformed as Stadium Racing Colmar. ==Achievements== * CFA Group A Champion: 2010 * Alsace Division Champion: 1973, 1997 ==Current squad== ==References== ==External links== *SR Colmar website (French) Category:Football clubs from former German territories Category:Association football clubs established in 1920 Category:1920 establishments in France
title: SR Colmar
